settings.alpha: -- THE APP IS IN ALPHA STATUS --
settings.description: Currently it is required to set the IP Address and the Port of your enigma2 Receiver by Hand. Therefor it is the best, if you also Setup your Router to a dedicated IP-Adress for your Receiver.
settings.warning: Due to the current Alpha State, the app can crash ant any time, if you find issues, please file them on GitHub or on the Homey Topic!
settings.info_ipadress_body:
On your Receiver open up the following:
Open Main Menu
Select Setup
Select System
Select Network
Choose Adapter Settings
Under Current configuration you will find your IP-Adress
settings.info_port_body:
If you don't have changed anything, your Port should be:
80
or
8080
This depends on the Box you use.
If you like to check, open a webbrowser and type in the IP-Adress of your box, if this opens the WebIf, then Port 80 is used.
If this opens a fault site, type in your IP-Adress followed by :8080, if this shows the WebIf, then Port 8080 is used.
Else you can check the configuration of the WebIf if the Ports has changed. Therfor open the Plugin Menu and check WebIf Config.
